description:
In this course, I walk you through the basic concepts and even into the advanced workflows of using Camtasia studio and Camtasia recorder. This course is a CLASSROOM - which means as long as the applications in this course are supported by their respective developers, I will continue creating more learning material for you! This course is geared towards the Mac version of Camtasia (with Windows versions in the making) - If you use Windows for now, don't fret; you will still be able to complete this course using either the Windows or Mac version of the Camtasia applications.

So what are you waiting for? Don't spend hundreds of dollars trying to learn something new - Join me now - Class in is session!
title: Camtasia Classroom
